question.title: Is it even possible to remove a relation from Hybris?
question.body:
I have a relation that I want to remove-

<relation code="AtoBRelation" localized="false" autocreate="true">
        <deployment table="AtoB" typecode="27002"/>
        <sourceElement qualifier="a" type="A" cardinality="many" collectiontype="list" navigable="true">
            <modifiers read="true" write="true" />
        </sourceElement>
        <targetElement qualifier="b" type="B" cardinality="many" collectiontype="list" navigable="true">
            <modifiers read="true" write="true" />
        </targetElement>
    </relation>

I want to remove a. Is that even possible?
